summary: I didn\'t like the fact that you got weaker Nightingale gear depending on when you finished the quest. Especially since it is the coolest looking gear in the game. This mod simply give you Nightingale Gear with the Max Base enchantments regardless of what level you get it at.
descriptionHtml:
I didn\'t like the fact that you got weaker Nightingale gear depending on when you finished the quest. Especially since it is the coolest looking gear in the game. This mod simply give you Nightingale Gear with the Max Base enchantments regardless of what level you get it at. What level and enchantment that is is different for each item I didn\'t change any base enchantments at all just made it so it gives you the highest version of the gear no matter when you receive it.

INSTALLATION: Use Nexus Mod Manager or drop into Skyrim/Data folder.

Known Bugs
-----------------
Some of the items may have bugged descriptions depending on what level you receive them at. Currently unfixable unfortunately but the enchantments work as they are suppose to.
author: BeastGevaudan
